original_title: CN Invaded Part 3: That Darn Platypus
overview: A platypus enrolls into CDMS, and he keeps rubbing into everyones face that he is a brain-sucking alien. Adam refuses to believe this, but the animals have reason to believe from various signs.
tagline: Watch As Adam Comes Face to Face with Something That's Not Human!
title: CN Invaded Part 3: That Darn Platypus
